00036 template<typename Point>
00037 void gmst(std::vector<Point> &points, std::vector<std::pair<typename std::vector<Point>::size_type,  typename std::vector<Point>::size_type> > &mst, int THold=1, int KruskalTHold=500)
00038 {
00039   zorder_lt<Point> lt;
00040   std::vector<WSP<Point> > wsp;
00041   int_partition UF;
00042   int num_threads=1;
00043   
00044 #ifdef _OPENMP
00045   num_threads = omp_get_max_threads();
00046 #endif
00047   sort(points.begin(), points.end(), lt);
00048   pwspd<Point> A(points, 1.0);
00049   A.run(wsp, num_threads);
00050   cout << wsp.size() << endl;
00051   UF.initialize(points.size());
00052   FilterKruskal<Point> B(A, UF, mst);
00053   B.run(wsp.begin(), wsp.end(), THold, KruskalTHold);
00054 }

00056 template<typename Point>
00057 class edgePred
00058 {
00059   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::size_type size_type;
00060   typedef std::pair<size_type, size_type> Edge;
00061 public:
00062   std::vector<Point> &points;
00063   
00064   edgePred(std::vector<Point> &p): points(p)
00065   {
00066   };
00067 
00068   bool operator()(const Edge a, const Edge b)
00069   {
00070     double da, db;
00071     
00072     da = points[a.first].sqr_dist(points[a.second]);
00073     db = points[b.first].sqr_dist(points[b.second]);
00074     return (da < db);
00075   }
00076 };

00083 template<typename Point>
00084 void bfgmst(std::vector<Point> &points, std::vector<std::pair<typename std::vector<Point>::size_type,  typename std::vector<Point>::size_type> > &mst)
00085 {
00086   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::size_type size_type;
00087   typedef std::pair<size_type, size_type> Edge;
00088 
00089   std::vector<Edge> edges;
00090 
00091   for(int i=0;i < (int) points.size();++i)
00092     {
00093       for(int j=0;j < (int) points.size();++j)
00094         {
00095           if(i!=j)
00096             edges.push_back(Edge(i,j));
00097         }
00098     }
00099   edgePred<Point> pred(points);
00100   sort(edges.begin(), edges.end(), pred);
00101 
00102   int_partition UF;
00103   UF.initialize(points.size());
00104 
00105   for(int i=0;i < (int) edges.size();++i)
00106     {
00107       if(UF.find(edges[i].first) != UF.find(edges[i].second))
00108         {
00109           mst.push_back(edges[i]);
00110           UF.union_blocks(edges[i].first, edges[i].second);
00111         }
00112     }
00113 }
00114 #endif
